languages.text: "Очнись! Все признаки очевидны. Ты и твои братья пали жертвой сил Хаоса, и сами не понимаете этого".
"Wake up! All the signs are clear as day. You and your brethren have fallen prey to the forces of Chaos, and you don't even realise it."
languages.original_text: "Очнись! Все признаки очевидны. Ты и твои братья пали жертвой сил Хаоса, и сами не понимаете этого".

languages.text: “快清醒过来！所有的迹象都已经很明确了。你和你的兄弟们都已经沦为混沌势力的猎物，而你甚至都没有意识到这一点。”
languages.original_text: "Wake up! All the signs are clear as day. You and your brethren have fallen prey to the forces of Chaos, and you don't even realise it."

traits.locale_text: “快清醒过来！所有的迹象都已经很明确了。你和你的兄弟们都已经沦为混沌势力的猎物，而你甚至都没有意识到这一点。”

languages.text: «¡Despierte! Las señales son inconfundibles. Sus hermanos y usted han caído en las garras de las fuerzas del Caos y ni siquiera se dan cuenta de ello».
languages.original_text: "Wake up! All the signs are clear as day. You and your brethren have fallen prey to the forces of Chaos, and you don't even realise it."

traits.locale_text: «¡Despierte! Las señales son inconfundibles. Sus hermanos y usted han caído en las garras de las fuerzas del Caos y ni siquiera se dan cuenta de ello».

languages.text: 「目を覚ませ！あらゆる物事がハッキリ物語っている。お前と同胞はフォース・オブ・ケイオスの餌食になって、その事実に気づいてすらいない」
languages.original_text: "Wake up! All the signs are clear as day. You and your brethren have fallen prey to the forces of Chaos, and you don't even realise it."

traits.locale_text: 「目を覚ませ！あらゆる物事がハッキリ物語っている。お前と同胞はフォース・オブ・ケイオスの餌食になって、その事実に気づいてすらいない」

languages.text: "Erwacht! Alle Zeichen sind glasklar. Ihr und Eure Brüder seid den Kräften des Chaos zum Opfer gefallen, und Ihr erkennt es nicht einmal."
languages.original_text: "Wake up! All the signs are clear as day. You and your brethren have fallen prey to the forces of Chaos, and you don't even realise it."

traits.locale_text: "Erwacht! Alle Zeichen sind glasklar. Ihr und Eure Brüder seid den Kräften des Chaos zum Opfer gefallen, und Ihr erkennt es nicht einmal."

languages.text: « Réveillez-vous, bon sang ! Les signes sont pourtant clairs. Vous et vos frères avez succombé aux forces du Chaos, et vous n'en avez même pas conscience. »
languages.original_text: "Wake up! All the signs are clear as day. You and your brethren have fallen prey to the forces of Chaos, and you don't even realise it."

traits.locale_text: « Réveillez-vous, bon sang ! Les signes sont pourtant clairs. Vous et vos frères avez succombé aux forces du Chaos, et vous n'en avez même pas conscience. »

languages.text: "Kendine gel artık! Tüm alametler gün gibi açık. Kardeşlerinle birlikte Kaos'un kuvvetlerinin tutsağı olmuşsunuz, farkında bile değilsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Wake up! All the signs are clear as day. You and your brethren have fallen prey to the forces of Chaos, and you don't even realise it."

traits.locale_text: "Kendine gel artık! Tüm alametler gün gibi açık. Kardeşlerinle birlikte Kaos'un kuvvetlerinin tutsağı olmuşsunuz, farkında bile değilsiniz."
